questions.question: 1) Which popstar is dating American Footballer Travis Kelce?
2) Which country successfully landed a spacecraft on the moon on January 20th 2024?
3) Which football manager recently announced his intention to resign from Liverpool?
4) Which former attorney declared Bankruptcy after being found guilty of defamation of election workers in the USA?
5) Which billionaire announced that they had implanted a wireless brain chip in a human?
6) What was the name of the storm that resulted in flooding across the UK in January 2024?
7) Which group based in the Yemen has been attacking shipping through the Red Sea?
8) Who replaced Suella Braverman as the Foreign Secretary in November last year?
9) What country do the government want to send people seeking asylum in small boats to?
10) How much money has the EU agreed to supply to Ukraine this week?
